Margaret Emo

  1. Foster Name: Margaret M. Cassell
  2. Foster Family: Ephriam and Sarah Cassell
  3. Location of Family: Republican City, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Alma, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: [1]
  7. Date of Birth: 1890-04-07
  8. Date of Death: 1956-02-28, Loveland, CO
  9. Gender: female
  10. Married Name: Margaret E. Hunter
  11. Spouse Name: William A. Hunter
  12. Notes: In 1910 census, Margaret is listed as the Cassells' daughter. Upon their marriage, Margaret and William moved to Kansas, where William was a farmer.
  13. Source: 1910 United States Federal Census; 1920 United States Federal Census; 1930 United States Federal Census; Gravestone, Loveland Burial Park, Loveland, CO; National Orphan Train Complex
